name: my-bhvr-app
description: A monorepo template built with Bun, Hono, Vite, and React
author: Steve Simkins

scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server && bun run build:client && bun run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/functions && cp server/dist/index.js dist/functions/[[path]].js && cp -r client/dist/* dist/
